mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recipe_comment WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND del_yn = 'N'

SELECT rc.recipe_id, rc.comment_id, rc.member_id, rc.comment, rc.rate, rc.reg_dt, rc.upt_dt, rc.status, rc.p_comment_id, rc.del_yn, mr.title FROM recipe_comment rc LEFT JOIN member_recipe mr ON rc.recipe_id = mr.recipe_id WHERE rc.member_id = #{memberId} AND rc.del_yn = 'N'
AND rc.comment ILIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND rc.recipe_id IN ( SELECT r.recipe_id from member_recipe r WHERE r.title ILIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY
rc.reg_dt rc.recipe_id rc.comment_id
${sortDirection} LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT board_id, board_division, member_id, title, contents, board_category_id, reg_dt, udt_dt, status, view_count, p_board_id, user_name FROM BOARD WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND board_division = #{boardDivision} ORDER BY reg_dt LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT (SELECT name FROM member x WHERE x.member_id = a.member_id) as name, recipe_id, member_id, recipe_category_id, title, "method", img_id, serving, "level", "time", calory, tip, reg_dt, upt_dt, view_count, comment_rate FROM member_recipe a WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY reg_dt DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{start}
